_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY Jexactyl PANEL - jexactyl.com
name: Discord Translate
author: jjakesv870@gmail.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Python App Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y python python-dev curl wget

# Check if curl or wget is available, install if missing
if ! command -v curl &> /dev/null
then
    echo "curl could not be found, installing wget instead"
    apt install -y wget
fi

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

echo "Installing required Python packages"
pip install -U --prefix .local discord.py deep-translator langdetect

echo "Downloading bot.py"
curl -o bot.py https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jjakesv/premadebots/refs/heads/main/TranslateDiscord.py || wget -O bot.py https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jjakesv/premadebots/refs/heads/main/TranslateDiscord.py

echo -e "Installation complete"
exit 0
